attributes.action: Make the Monarch's Official Birthday a National Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Monarchy is something which unites all British people, this is something no politician can do. 

Celebrating the Monarch's Birthday would be a fantastic way for British people to celebrate our History and Culture. Trooping the Colour is brilliant way to show our traditions and how good the British are at doing them.

Such an event is the perfect time for the Monarch, Armed Forces and British Subjects to show their loyalty to each other!

So ask you to sign below if you want HM's Birthday to be a National Holiday!! God Save the Queen
